{"id":416712762,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2 years, 10 months","timestamp":1604494511,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"36 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/416712762/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Add Two Numbers","memory":"71.9 MB","code":"/**\n * Definition for singly-linked list.\n * struct ListNode {\n *     int val;\n *     ListNode *next;\n *     ListNode() : val(0), next(nullptr) {}\n *     ListNode(int x) : val(x), next(nullptr) {}\n *     ListNode(int x, ListNode *next) : val(x), next(next) {}\n * };\n */\nclass Solution {\npublic:\n    ListNode* addTwoNumbers(ListNode* l1, ListNode* l2) {\n        ListNode* head = new ListNode(0, 0);\n        ListNode* itr = head;;\n\n        helper(itr, l1, l2, 0);\n        head = head->next;\n        return head;\n    }\n    \n    void helper(ListNode* itr, ListNode* l1, ListNode* l2, int carry) {\n        int l1d = (l1 == NULL)? 0 : l1->val;\n        int l2d = (l2 == NULL)? 0 : l2->val;\n        int v = (l1d + l2d + carry) % 10;\n        carry = (l1d + l2d + carry >= 10)? 1 : 0; \n        \n        if (l1 == NULL && l2 == NULL) {\n            if (v != 0) {\n                ListNode* temp = new ListNode(v);\n                itr->next = temp;\n            }\n            return;\n        }\n        \n        if (l1 != NULL && l2 != NULL) {\n            ListNode* temp = new ListNode(v);\n            itr->next = temp;\n            helper(itr->next, l1->next, l2->next, carry);\n        }\n        else if (l1 == NULL) {\n            ListNode* temp = new ListNode(v);\n            itr->next = temp;\n            helper(itr->next, l1, l2->next, carry);\n        }\n        else if (l2 == NULL) {\n            ListNode* temp = new ListNode(v);\n            itr->next = temp;\n            helper(itr->next, l1->next, l2, carry);\n        }\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"add-two-numbers","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
